pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, July 19, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

McDougall, Ontario

11:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit Tim Horton Memorial Camp.

Tim Horton Memorial Camp
539 Lorimer Lake Road

Notes for media:

    • All photo opportunities will be outdoors
    • Media should arrive no later than 11:00 a.m. and present themselves at the main office/Ontario building
    • Parking is available along the main road

Ontario

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Dock 2018 (un)Conference.

Closed to media.

 

Media appearances:

10:20 a.m. A brief interview with the Prime Minister will air on The Bay 88.7 FM, Muskoka Morning.
10:45 a.m. A brief interview with the Prime Minister will air on 104.1 The Dock.
